content: round that has a multiple of 3 each side example round 7 has 27sts each side where i stopped so 27 is a multiple of 3 but round 8 will have 31sts each side which 31 isn t a multiple of 3 you will have a multiple of 3 every 4 rounds you are able to increase square afterwards as well to fit your book/device you can change colours in any round proceed with square pattern ©copyright 2023 ana teixeira diagram continuous granny square section magic_ring mc ©copyright 2023 ana teixeira pattern continuation part 2 crossed double_crochet and puff section diagram on page 10 round 1 ch4 puff ch2 puff ch1 double_crochet in corner space *sk2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet on previous 2 skip sts through the back* repeat from *to* until corner double_crochet ch1 puff ch2 puff ch1 double_crochet in corner space repeat from to until before last corner join with slip_stitch to top of 3rd chain from beg of round slip_stitch until corner ch2 space - 29sts each side or multiple of 3+2 crossed double_crochet as in bold letters in round 1 above sk2 double_crochet next st double_crochet on previous 2 skipped sts through the back to front round 2 ch4 puff ch2 puff ch1 double_crochet in corner ch2 space skip next puff double_crochet in ch1 space double_crochet in next 29sts or your previous end of round st count until ch1 space double_crochet in ch1 space skip next puff double_crochet ch1 puff ch2 puff ch1 double_crochet in corner ch2 space skip next puff repeat from to until end join with slip_stitch to top of 3rd chain from beg of round slip_stitch until corner ch2 space - 33sts each side or multiple of 3 ©copyright 2023 ana teixeira pattern continuation part 2 crossed double_crochet and puff section round 3 ch4 puff ch2 puff ch1 double_crochet in corner ch2 space double_crochet in next puff double_crochet in next ch1 space *sk2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet on previous 2 skip sts through the back* repeat from *to* until ch1 space before corner double_crochet in ch1 space double_crochet in next puff double_crochet ch1 puff ch2 puff ch1 double_crochet in corner space double_crochet in next puff double_crochet in next ch1 space *sk2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet on previous 2 skip sts through the back* repeat from *to* until ch1 space before corner repeat from to double_crochet in ch1 space double_crochet in next puff join with slip_stitch to top of 3rd chain from beg of round slip_stitch until corner ch2 space - 39sts each side or multiple of 3 round 4 ch4 puff ch2 puff ch1 double_crochet in corner ch2 space double_crochet in next puff double_crochet in ch1 space double_crochet in next 39sts or your previous end of round st count until ch1 space double_crochet in ch1 space double_crochet in next puff double_crochet ch1 puff ch2 puff ch1 double_crochet in corner ch2 space double_crochet in next puff double_crochet in next ch1 space double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from to until end join
